com.scalar.db.api

Class DeleteIf

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scalar.db.api.DeleteIf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MutationCondition

    @Immutable
public class DeleteIf
extends java.lang.Object
implements MutationCondition
    An optional parameter of Delete for conditional delete. Delete with this condition makes the operation take effect only if a specified condition is met.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeleteIf(ConditionalExpression... expressions)
      Constructs a DeleteIf with the specified conditional expressions.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this object. The other object is considered equal if:
        • it is also an DeleteIf and
        • both instances have the same expressions
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - an object to be tested for equality
        Returns:
        true if the other object is "equal to" this object otherwise false
